description: Data Science Services on Issues Related to Criminal Justice System Involvement
full_summary:
=====================================

**Government Tender Announcement: Data Science Services**

**Reference Number:** PW-23-01031335
**Solicitation Number:** 1000030656-001

### Contract Location

* **Contracting Entity:** Department of Justice Canada
* **Contract Address:** 284 Wellington Street, Ottawa, ON K1A 0H8, Canada
* **End User Entity:** Department of Justice Canada

### Contract Description

This solicitation aims to acquire Data Science Services related to issues involving the Criminal Justice System. Offerors must provide expertise in the following areas:

* Data development for data science research
* Research using data science techniques (e.g., big data analytics, machine learning)
* Data visualization
* Programming (e.g., Python, SQL, R)
* Design, usability, and functionality of data science-driven applications

Services will be required in the following areas of application:

* Statistics Canada microdata
* Canadian social or criminal justice sector microdata

### Contract Duration and Option Periods

Up to ten (10) Standing Offers will be awarded, with a contract duration of June 30, 2026 and the option to extend by two (2) additional option periods of one (1) year each.

### Contract Evaluation Criteria

The Department of Justice Canada will select the best-suited Offeror based on the following combination of criteria:

* Availability of Offeror’s resources
* Need for specific types of services and subject matter expertise
* Official Language of service delivery
* Location of service delivery within Canada
* Estimated cost to complete the work

### Security Requirements

This contract has associated security requirements. Offerors should refer to Part 6 - Security Requirements, and Part 7 - Standing Offer and Resulting Contract Clauses for more information.

### Tender Submission and Evaluation

Offerors must submit their proposals in accordance with the instructions provided in the solicitation documents. The Department of Justice Canada will evaluate proposals based on the above-mentioned evaluation criteria.

### Tender Documents

The tender documents can be downloaded from [canadabuys.canada.ca](canadabuys.canada.ca).
